idea-plugin.name: Spring Boot CRUD Generator
idea-plugin.description:
Spring Boot CRUD Generator generates production-ready CRUD layers for Spring Boot applications directly from a JPA entity.

  • REST Controller - Complete CRUD endpoints with proper HTTP methods
  • Service Layer - Transaction management and business logic
  • Repository - Spring Data JPA repository interface
  • DTO - Data Transfer Objects with validation annotations
  • Mapper - Entity-DTO conversion utilities

Eliminates repetitive CRUD boilerplate and enforces a clean, layered backend architecture using IntelliJ PSI-based code generation.

Features

  • Generate complete CRUD layer from any JPA entity
  • Supports Jakarta and Javax persistence annotations
  • Automatic field mapping with proper getters/setters
  • REST API with standard HTTP methods (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE)
  • Transaction-aware service layer
  • Input validation using Jakarta Bean Validation

Usage

  1. Right-click on any JPA entity class in the editor
  2. Select "Generate Spring Boot CRUD"
  3. All layers will be generated automatically in appropriate packages

Generated Structure

        com.example.yourapp
        ├── entity (your existing entity)
        ├── dto (generated DTOs)
        ├── mapper (generated mappers)
        ├── repository (generated repositories)
        ├── service (generated services)
        └── controller (generated controllers)
